content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Salary and Paydays\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Compensation is paid monthly and consists of three payments:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Advance\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is paid on the 21\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"st\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-superscript\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" of the month for the current month. The first payment is 50 BYN. If the employee is hired for part-time employment, the amount of the advance is determined in proportion to the working hours. Subsequent payments can be increased by request, up to 45% of the base pay. Requests to increase or decrease the advance payment should be sent to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFAAdvanceBY@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFAAdvanceBY@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" not later than 1 working day before the date of the payment. Please note, that you will receive a reply from WFA Advance BY not earlier than 2-3 days prior to the date of the payment. The amount of the payment canâ€™t be more than 45% of the base pay minus tax and other mandatory deductions, or less than 10 BYN;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The rest of the base pay\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is paid on the 7\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"th\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-superscript\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" of each month for the previous month;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The bonus part\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" (in case of project assignment) is paid on the 15\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"th\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-superscript\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" day of the month following the month of cooperation.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If any of these dates fall on a weekend or holiday, compensation is paid on the last working day before the date.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All payments are made to Priorbank cards in Belarusian rubles. Within a few days after the salary payment, a detailed payslip is sent to employees via e-mail.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You may address your questions on salary and compensation scheme to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFAAnywhereSalary@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFA Anywhere Salary\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Leaves and vacation\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM offers 18 workdays (24 calendar) regular paid vacation for employees who have worked less than 3 years; and 20 workdays (28 calendar days) for employees who worked 3 years and more. The company allows to split your vacations into shorter periods, calculated in working days and even hours!\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In case of child's birth, wedding, close relatives' loss, employees are also granted from one to three days' paid leave.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As a benefit, the Company provides 7 paid days per year of sick leave without a medical certificate.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please remember that for any type of leave you need to create a vacation request at \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://vacation.epam.com/epm-vts-web/dashboard\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"vacation.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" (Google Chrome is the only supported browser). atmosphere.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We offer a wide range of perks and benefits designed to help you feel well. The well-being of our employees makes our success possible!\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Since the package differs from country to country, please review the typical benefits suite in your location on \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMPLXPUB/Benefits\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Anywhere Benefits\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you have any questions about benefits, please address them to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFAAnywherePeople@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFA Anywhere People\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" or your People Partner.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
